name: 曾添文
objective: 介紹單位換算與有效數位，元素的原子結構、化學方程式平衡與計算，反應熱，氣體與氣體定律，大氣層與環境污染，週期表，化學鍵，化合物的分子結構，熱力學，動力學，反應機構，平衡常數，氧化與還原，酸鹼反應，電化學，混合物的分離及現代科技材料，奠定良好化學基礎。
schedule:
1~2.化學鍵(II): Chemical bonding(II)
3~4.分子間作用力:Intermolecular forces-liquids and solids
5~6.溶液及物理性質: Solutions and their physical properties 
7~8.化學動力學: Chemical kinetics, rate law, integrated rate law, mechanism, catalysis
9~10.化學平衡: Chemical equilibrium, Chatelier's principle
11.酸鹼理論: Acids and bases, Lewis acids and bases
12~13.酸鹼平衡: Acid-base equilibria
14~15.溶解度與錯合物平衡: Solubility and complex-ion equilibria
16~17.自發反應: Spontaneous change-entreopy and Gibbs energy
18. 電化學: Electrochemistry, voltaic cells, cell emf, batteries, electrolys
scorePolicy: 共考7-8次小考(包括期中, 期末各一次)平均,作為學期成績.
materials:
General Chemistry
Ralph H. Petrucci; F. F. Herring; J. D. Madura; C. Bissonnette
TENTH EDITION
Brooks/Pearson Canada Inc., 2011.
